mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.org_id, d.name orgName, a.login_name, a.password, a.name, a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.state, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date FROM sys_user a left join sys_org d on d.id = a.org_id
mapper.select:
WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.login_name like CONCAT('%', #{loginName}, '%')
AND (a.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') or a.login_name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%'))
AND a.org_id = #{orgId}
AND a.id in (${id})
and a.id not in(select ur.user_id from sys_user_role ur where ur.role_id = #{roleId})
ORDER BY a.create_date
select u.*,d.org_name orgName from sys_user u, sys_user_role ur, sys_dept d where u.del_flag = '0' and u.id = ur.user_id and d.id = u.dept_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( id, dept_id, login_name, password, name, email, phone, mobile, state, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deptId}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{state}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )

INSERT INTO sys_user_role(user_id, role_id)
SELECT #{id}, #{role.id} FROM dual
